KnownEventRules.ToolTipText: Failed to enable Silent Encryption. TPM is not available.\n\nWith Virtual Machines this is either forgotten TPM enablement or maybe more common mounted .ISO image in VM DVD drive
KnownEventRules.DeveloperNotes: Failed to enable Silent Encryption. TPM is not available. With Virtual Machines this is either forgotten TPM enablement or maybe more common mounted .ISO image in VM DVD drive
